name: Giovanni Trovato
title: Senior iOS Developer
profile: Senior iOS Developer with 7+ years building enterprise mobile solutions and B2B applications. Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, and modern iOS architecture for secure, scalable business applications. Proven track record shipping production apps, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and mentoring teams. Passionate about clean architecture and delivering robust solutions for real business challenges.
